about_the_game:
Step into the haunting realm of Bobo's Funzone, in this horror/puzzle adventure. Your mission: find your daughter, who was attending a birthday party here. Navigate the eerie corridors, unearth what happend, and be careful and cautious as Bobo is about.

Navigate Bobo's Funzone a kids entertainment centre as you look for your child




Roam through the dimly lit corridors of Bobo's Funzone, a once joyful place now filled with shadows and ominous echoes. Your mission is clear: find your child amidst the unsettling atmosphere, where each corner may hold a terrifying surprise.

Solve Puzzles With Found Objects




Uncover hidden objects and tools scattered throughout the Funzone to aid your quest. Solve intricate puzzles that stand between you and the safety of your child.

Explore the mystery of what happened here




Delve into the disturbing history of Bobo's Funzone as you unearth clues that hint at the sinister events that unfolded within its walls. What dark secrets led this once joyful place to become a nightmare? The answers lie in the shadows, waiting to be uncovered.

Be careful, you're not alone – Bobo is about




Beware of Bobo, he lurks in the darkest corners of the entertainment center. As you navigate the haunted halls, keep a watchful eye, for Bobo is not just a figment of your imagination. Survival depends on your ability to outsmart and escape the clutches of him.

Will you be able to escape the funzone with your daughter?

content_descriptors.notes: Blood effects are shown in the game

legal_notice: Game created by Unreal Games and published by Mascot Br Studio.
name: Bobos FunZone

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 64-Bit or later
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 2500K or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660 2 GB or AMD equivalent
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-Bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 4790K or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970 or AMD equivalent
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
